original_text: Those false prophets belong to this world. Their message comes from the ideas of people of this world. So the people of this world believe what they teach.
korean_text: 그들은 세상에 속한 고로 세상에 속한 말을 하매 세상이 그들의 말을 듣느니라

sentences.original_text: Those false prophets belong to this world.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 거짓 선지자들은 이 세상에 속한다.

sentences.original_text: Their message comes from the ideas of people
So the people of this world
